app_description.message: Materialna strona Nowej Karty dla Chrome'a

content_message.message: Otwórz ustawienia i dodaje jakieś karty! :)
content_message.description: Message that shows up if the user hasn't enabled any cards

appscard_button.description: Label for a button that shows the grid of all installed apps

weathercard_button.description: Label for a button that opens an external site with weather forecasts

weathercard_message.message: Otwórz ustawienia i ustaw swoją lokację, aby otrzymać prognozę pogody.
weathercard_message.description: Message that shows up when the user has neither set their location nor enabled automatic geolocation

settings_title.description: Title for the dialog showing settings

settings_features_header.description: Header text for the section in settings where features can be enabled or disabled

settings_features_description.message: Niektóre z opcji mogą wymagać dodatkowych uprawnień.
settings_features_description.description: Description for the features section in settings

settings_features_name_appscard.description: Name of the card showing user's apps

settings_features_name_topsitescard.description: Name of the card showing most visited sites

settings_features_name_bookmarkssearch.description: Name of the feature allowing for bookmarks to be searched

settings_features_name_weathercard.description: Name of the card showing a weather forecast

settings_search_header.description: Header text for the section in settings where the preferred search engine can be picked

settings_location_header.description: Header text for the section in settings where location can be set for the weather forecast

settings_location_description1.message: Używane w celu ściągnięcia prognozy pogody.
settings_location_description1.description: First line of description for the location section in settings

settings_location_description2_1.description: Second line, part 1 of description for the location section in settings

settings_location_description2_2.description: Second line, part 2 of description for the location section in settings

settings_location_description2_3.description: Second line, part 3 of description for the location section in settings

settings_location_geolocation_hint.message: Użyj geolokacji, by automatycznie wykryć, gdzie jesteś.
settings_location_geolocation_hint.description: Label next to a checkbox in settings

settings_location_featurehint.description: Hint in a textfield where location for the weather forecast can be set

settings_tempunits_header.description: Header text for the section in settings where preferred temperature units can be picked

about_version.description: Version display in the about dialog

statestore_search_text.description: Label on a button that shows up when the user enters some text in the searchbar

statestore_search_description.message: Przeprowadź akcję wyszukiwania w $search_engine$ używając tego zapytania
statestore_search_description.description: Popover text for the button in statestore_search_text
